articles.author: ICC
articles.title: India name squads for the limited overs leg of Australia tour - ICC Cricket
articles.description: The Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) have named squads for the upcoming ODI and T20I series against Australia.
articles.content: The Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) have named squads for the upcoming ODI and T20I series against Australia.Harmanpreet Kaur leads the side in both the formats, while Smriti Mandhana is… [+1608 chars]
